root: ^Ulp... I was not... designed for immediate gravity inversion.
^Neither was half of the crap in here, it seems...
^At least they designed something good in here.
^I should be able to aim this with the <color=green>Mouse</color> and fire it with <color=green>Left Click.</color>
^But I can't hold this and my knife... I'll have to swap between them with the <color=green>scroll wheel.
^<color=red> Hope you ain't using a mousepad.
